DOC.brief_summary: A randomized controlled trial of a video decision aid in 50 patients with advanced brain cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study of Using Video Images in Advance Care Planning in Malignant Glioma Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized controlled trial of a video decision aid in 50 patients with advanced brain cancer. Subjects will have three options for their goals of care: life prolonging care, basic medical care, or comfort care.
DOC.criteria: Advanced brain cancer English Speaking Able to provide informed consent Folstein mini mental status score of 23 or less
